pr_title: Include native transport libs by default

timeline.message:
Include native transport libs by default

All of Hono's service components now include Netty's native transport
libraries by default. The libraries are license compatible with EPL so
there is no reason to not include them by default and then allow users
to simply enable native transport using the existing configuration
property.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText:
Is there a way to let this also be applied to the quarkus adapters?
Maybe this could also be a reason to rename preferNative to preferNativeTransport and deprecate the preferNative option (seeing this option in the config files without any context, I was first wondering whether this has something to do with quarkus native images; preferNativeTransport has at least the analogy with the vert.x option and the "netty-transport-native" module).
